IndexClipper.Export


Clipper.Export


This unit contains the code that exports the library into shared objects (ie .DLL and .so files).
For details, see the extensive comments embedded in the clipper.export.h file.
The library also contains C++ code that generates a Windows DLL file and a Delphi sample application that accesses the compiled DLL.

  • BooleanOp - 64bit int coordinates
  • BooleanOpD - double coordinates
  • BooleanOpPt - 64bit int coordinates & PolyTree64
  • BooleanOpPtD - double coordinates & PolyTreeD
  • DisposeExportedCPath
  • DisposeExportedCPathD
  • DisposeExportedCPaths
  • DisposeExportedCPathsD
  • DisposeExportedCPolyTree
  • DisposeExportedCPolyTreeD
  • ExecuteRectClip
  • ExecuteRectClipD
  • ExecuteRectClipLines
  • ExecuteRectClipLinesD
  • InflatePaths
  • InflatePathsD
  • Version
